languages.text:
Броня этого существа сломана. За каждый уровень эффекта оно получает:
<indent=5%>−1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>−10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g}</indent>
languages.original_text:
The armour of this creature was broken. For each stack, they suffer:
<indent=5%>−1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>−10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}</indent>

<indent=5%>−1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}</indent>

languages.text:
La armadura de esta criatura se ha roto. Por cada acumulación, sufren:
<indent=5%>−1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>−10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}</indent>

traits.locale_text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} de esta criatura se ha roto. Por cada acumulación, sufren:
<indent=5%>−1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>−10 % de armadura</indent>

languages.text:
此生物的护甲被破坏了。每层“破甲”效果都会导致：
<indent=5%>−1{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>−10%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}</indent>
languages.original_text:

<indent=5%>−10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}</indent>

traits.locale_text:

<indent=5%>−1{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>-10%护甲</indent>

languages.text:
L'armure de cette créature a été brisée. À chaque cumul, elle subit :
<indent=5%>−1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>−10 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g}</indent>
languages.original_text:
The armour of this creature was broken. For each stack, they suffer:
<indent=5%>−1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}</indent>

<indent=5%>-1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>-10 % d'armure</indent>

languages.text:
Die Rüstung dieser Kreatur wurde aufgebrochen. Für jeden Stapel hat sie:
<indent=5%>−1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>−10 % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}</indent>
languages.original_text:
The armour of this creature was broken. For each stack, they suffer:
<indent=5%>−1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>−10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Die {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} dieser Kreatur wurde aufgebrochen. Für jede Addition erleidet sie:
<indent=5%>−1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>−10 % Rüstung</indent>

languages.text:
この生物のアーマーが壊れる。累積するごとに、次の状態になる。
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g} −1</indent>
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g} −10%</indent>
languages.original_text:
The armour of this creature was broken. For each stack, they suffer:
<indent=5%>−1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>−10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}</indent>

traits.locale_text:
この生物の{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}が壊れる。累積するごとに、次の状態になる。
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g} −1</indent>
<indent=5%>アーマー −10%</indent>

languages.text:
Bu yaratığın zırhı kırıldı. Her birikimde şunlara maruz kalır:
<indent=5%>−1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>−%10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g}</indent>
languages.original_text:
The armour of this creature was broken. For each stack, they suffer:
<indent=5%>−1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>−10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}</indent>
